languages.text: ""Бессердечный" пылал всеми оттенками ужаса при попытке броситься в Имматериум... Наш триумф стоил дорого. Это... важный урок".

traits.locale_text: "Бессердечный" пылал всеми оттенками ужаса при попытке броситься в Имматериум... Наш триумф стоил дорого. Это... важный урок".

languages.text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."
languages.original_text: ""Бессердечный" пылал всеми оттенками ужаса при попытке броситься в Имматериум... Наш триумф стоил дорого. Это... важный урок".

traits.locale_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."
"The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

"The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

languages.text: 「ハートレスが非物質世界へと墜ちかけたとき、そこにはあらゆる種類の恐怖が渦巻いていました…これは大きな代償を伴う勝利であり、貴重な教訓にもなりました」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスが非物質世界へと墜ちかけたとき、そこにはあらゆる種類の恐怖が渦巻いていました…これは大きな代償を伴う勝利であり、貴重な教訓にもなりました」

languages.text: "Die Heartless wurde von sämtlichen Spielarten des Grauens umschlossen, als sie beinahe in das Immaterium gestürzt wäre ... Es war ein teuer erkaufter Triumph und eine wertvolle Lektion."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

traits.locale_text: "Die Heartless wurde von sämtlichen Spielarten des Grauens umschlossen, als sie beinahe in das Immaterium gestürzt wäre ... Es war ein teuer erkaufter Triumph und eine wertvolle Lektion."

languages.text: « Le Sans-Cœur était submergé par toutes les nuances de l'horreur lorsqu'il a failli plonger dans l'Immaterium... Ce triomphe nous a coûté cher, mais nous en avons tiré une importante leçon. »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

traits.locale_text: « Le Sans-Cœur était submergé par toutes les nuances de l'horreur lorsqu'il a failli plonger dans l'Immaterium... Ce triomphe nous a coûté cher, mais nous en avons tiré une importante leçon. »

languages.text: «La Desalmada se impregnó de todas las tonalidades del terror cuando casi fue engullida por el Inmaterio... Ha sido una victoria costosa, y una lección no menos valiosa».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

traits.locale_text: «La Desalmada se impregnó de todas las tonalidades del terror cuando casi fue engullida por el Inmaterio... Ha sido una victoria costosa, y una lección no menos valiosa».

languages.text: “无心号差点就彻底落入了亚空间，被恐怖之物的阴影吞没……这场胜利让我们付出了巨大的代价，也是个宝贵的教训。”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

traits.locale_text: “无心号差点就彻底落入了亚空间，被恐怖之物的阴影吞没……这场胜利让我们付出了巨大的代价，也是个宝贵的教训。”

languages.text: "Taşkalp, Tindiyar'da batmak üzereyken dört yandan korkuya teslim olmuştu. Zaferin bedeli ağır oldu ama önemli bir ders aldık."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp, Tindiyar'da batmak üzereyken dört yandan korkuya teslim olmuştu. Zaferin bedeli ağır oldu ama önemli bir ders aldık."

languages.original_text: "The Heartless was engulfed in every shade of horror when it almost plunged into the Immaterium... It was a costly triumph, and a valuable lesson."
